alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Eastern San Miguel County; Estancia Valley; Harding County; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 2:48AM MST until January 24 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations ranging between 1 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Estancia Valley, Eastern San Miguel County, Harding County, Northeast Highlands, and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes along portions of I-40. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Eastern San Miguel County; Estancia Valley; Harding County; Northeast Highlands
